name: The Pursuit Of Power
description:
The Pursuit of Power

"Power is always dangerous... It corrupts the best and attracts the worst. Power is only given to those who are prepared to lower themselves to pick it up" -Ragnar LothBrock.

Yet, here we are.. lowering our self to get more power to destroy this feeling of suffering and pain. We never asked for it, but we know that we need it in order to be accepted. Some people get loved for who they are, meanwhile some others have to pay for love.

This may or may not be the story of our little brightness character...

The game has been created in 48 hours for challenging myself. I wanted to know what my art and code abilities were.

The game is very very short. You can actually complete it in less than 10 minutes...

WARNING: Increase at MAX Level the brightness of you computer if you can't see... unfortunately I couldn't fix this problem in time.
